title: Garlicky Orecchiette with Swiss Chard and Fontina
directions: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain, reserving 1/4 cup pasta water.

Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add Swiss chard, garlic, and red pepper flakes and season with salt. Cook, stirring, until greens are just wilted, 2 to 3 minutes. Add cooked pasta and 1/4 cup reserved pasta water and stir to create a sauce. Add fontina and stir until melted.
Garnish with parsley and serve with Fontina.
ingredients: 3 c. grated Fontina, plus more for garnish
